A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was never more disappointed in a movie in my entire life than this one. It ruins all the good The Force Awakens did to set up the franchise in every way possible. Every plot point is meaningless or just downright awful. One specific part of the movie is something that previous films have said it definitely can't happen because it'll make you think \"Hey\, every battle could've been avoided if they just did this? But didn't it say in the prequels and in Empire that it's impossible to do this?\" Huge disappointment and truly sad that this was Carrie Fisher's send-off.
